title: Love - Aromatherapy & Crystal Organic Roll On
description: Love - Aromatherapy & Crystal Organic Roll On
cleaned_text: Love - Aromatherapy & Crystal Organic Roll On This delicate blend contains therapeutic oils and rose quartz gemstones to help bring love into your life, it promotes self-love, compassion and self-care. These special ingredients are specifically chosen to enhance and strengthen the individual intentions of each bottle. Oils: Rose Oil & Lavender Gemstone Rose Quartz: stone of unconditional love, enhances the capacity for empathy and compassion. Directions: Apply to pulse points or chakras as desired. For external use only. 0.5 fl oz/15 ml Set the intention to get in touch with your higher self and receive wisdom with gratitude. CAUTION: If pregnant, nursing, or under doctor care, consult a physician. Discontinue use if skin irritation occurs. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children.
